channel.title: [718] owner donator rights help
channel.description: so i've got a matrix 718 server and i've gotten myself owner status on it finally (new to all of this) and when try to spawn in items it'll work but when i go to equip them it'll say that i need to vote to be able to use it or tell me i need to be donator/extreme donator. i've found the code where i need to change it to my name and put it in but even doing this and having owner rights isn't allowing me to use the items. any ideas on what i should do?

item.title: [718] owner donator rights help
item.dc:creator: @trilliumtrigger trilliumtrigger
item.description:
@trilliumtrigger wrote:

so i’ve got a matrix 718 server and i’ve gotten myself owner status on it finally (new to all of this) and when try to spawn in items it’ll work but when i go to equip them it’ll say that i need to vote to be able to use it or tell me i need to be donator/extreme donator. i’ve found the code where i need to change it to my name and put it in but even doing this and having owner rights isn’t allowing me to use the items. any ideas on what i should do?
